UserAccount.title: UserAccount
UserAccount.description: Represents a user account in the E&F WorkBee application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user account.

accountType.description: The type of user account: 'Worker' or 'Customer'.

definition.description: Stores user account information. Uses path-based ownership for secure and simple access control.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user. This is used as the document ID.

firestore.reasoning: This design prioritizes simplicity and security for basic user account management. We leverage path-based ownership for user accounts, storing each user's data under `/users/{userId}`. This provides strong isolation and eliminates the need for complex authorization logic. The `UserAccount` entity includes the `accountType`, enabling role-based access control. The path-based approach inherently supports QAPs as listing users requires no complex filtering rules; it simply involves querying a collection.
